0e24bbe07123e379e1351fbb8862ae48.title: It looks elegant for prototyping but for production, it looks dangerous.

67cee85545ce.bio: A programmer. Automating stuff when possible. Hobby => Learning how everything works. I believe that strength comes from within, while knowledge is they key.
67cee85545ce.name: Sergio Nadir

bf8a0cb44eda.bio: Security Engineer, Writer and Speaker. I write and talk about my trials and tribulations in Computer Security, Lean Startup, The Cloud and Human Optimization.
bf8a0cb44eda.name: Ron Flores Del Rosario

paragraphs.name: c39e
paragraphs.text: If a directory shares more than one .go file, all the methods and variables are shared between the entire package, even the private once. It helps for separating a package into even smaller chunks and avoiding large single files.

paragraphs.name: f046
paragraphs.text: What’s going on here? Nothing special, Golang just downloads the repo from https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go into your GOPATH/src directory.

paragraphs.name: c95b
paragraphs.text: It looks elegant for prototyping but for production, it looks dangerous. Which branch/tag is it downloading from github? Will another dev (or CI server) get the same code.

2d01c6ee6b1d.title: This is why I love the Go Programming Language — I am not an expert (yet), but the beauty of the…

paragraphs.name: f450
paragraphs.text: This is why I love the Go Programming Language — I am not an expert (yet), but the beauty of the language is you don’t have to be to get up and running.
